user.title: Enter Bridge's Hostname/IP Address and Password
user.description:
Please enter the Hostname or IP Address and Password of your Rademacher Bridge (Start2Smart or Homepilot).
If Bridge has no Authentication enable you must leave Password empty.
When Authentication is enabled, Hostname (FQDN) must be provided, IP Address won't work.

error.cannot_connect: Error connecting to the bridge. Please verify the bridge is connected to the network, and verify that the Hostname/IP is correct.
error.auth_error: Invalid password. Please verify the password provided is correct. If Authentication is not enabled, leave Password field empty.
